4_micro_examples: Circle, Square, Triangle, Rectangle (All are polygons except Circle; Circle is odd one out)
Shaded Square, Shaded Circle, Unshaded Square, Shaded Triangle (Unshaded Square is odd one out)
Arrow up, Arrow down, Arrow left, Arrow right (All are arrows; no odd one out)
Large Circle, Small Circle, Large Square, Large Triangle (Small Circle is odd one out)
Triangle, Triangle with dot, Triangle with two dots, Square (Square is odd one out)
Rectangle, Rectangle, Rectangle, Square (Square is odd one out)
Circle with line, Square with line, Triangle with line, Circle (Circle is odd one out)
Shaded Hexagon, Shaded Pentagon, Shaded Square, Unshaded Hexagon (Unshaded Hexagon is odd one out)
Diamond, Diamond rotated, Square, Diamond (Square is odd one out)
Star, Star with dot, Star with two dots, Hexagon (Hexagon is odd one out)

5_exam_examples.problem: Which figure is the odd one out: Shaded Circle, Shaded Square, Unshaded Circle, Shaded Triangle?
solution_steps: Three figures are shaded; one is unshaded.
Unshaded Circle is the odd one out.

5_exam_examples.problem: Find the group with the same property: All triangles, All squares, All circles, One rectangle and three squares.
solution_steps: First three groups have identical shapes.
Last group has a rectangle, which is different.
Last group is the odd one out.
5_exam_examples.answer: Group with one rectangle and three squares.

5_exam_examples.problem: Which figure is the odd one out: Large Square, Small Square, Large Circle, Large Triangle?
solution_steps: Three figures are large; one is small.
Small Square is the odd one out.

5_exam_examples.problem: Which figure is the odd one out: Arrow up, Arrow down, Arrow left, Triangle?
solution_steps: Three are arrows; one is a triangle.
Triangle is the odd one out.

5_exam_examples.problem: Which figure is the odd one out: Shaded Hexagon, Shaded Pentagon, Shaded Square, Unshaded Hexagon?
solution_steps: Three are shaded; one is unshaded.
Unshaded Hexagon is the odd one out.

5_exam_examples.problem: Which figure is the odd one out: Circle with line, Square with line, Triangle with line, Circle?
solution_steps: Three have a line; one does not.
Circle is the odd one out.

5_exam_examples.problem: Which figure is the odd one out: Rectangle, Rectangle, Rectangle, Square?
solution_steps: Three are rectangles; one is a square.
Square is the odd one out.

5_exam_examples.problem: Which figure is the odd one out: Diamond, Diamond rotated, Square, Diamond?
solution_steps: Three are diamonds (even if rotated); one is a square.
Square is the odd one out.

5_exam_examples.problem: Which figure is the odd one out: Star, Star with dot, Star with two dots, Hexagon?
solution_steps: Three are stars; one is a hexagon.
Hexagon is the odd one out.

5_exam_examples.problem: Which figure is the odd one out: Triangle, Triangle with dot, Triangle with two dots, Square?
solution_steps: Three are triangles; one is a square.
Square is the odd one out.
